meanings.definition: Deoxyribonucleic acid: a self-replicating material present in nearly all living organisms as the main constituent of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the dna of the cells under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The dna of a person determines many of their physical traits.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue in the dna left at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: In the library of life, dna is the book that holds all the secrets.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to explain how dna carries genetic information.

meanings.definition: DNA: abbreviation for deoxyribonucleic acid, the carrier of genetic information.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician analyzed the DNA samples to identify the suspect.
meanings.sent2: DNA testing can reveal important details about a person's ancestry.
meanings.sent3: The DNA abbreviation was confusing to the new student in biology class.
meanings.sent4: In the world of genetics, DNA is like a roadmap guiding our traits.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explained how DNA plays a crucial role in inheritance.
